verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus, faithful King
Lord with grateful hearts we sing

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
How great is the love
How great is the love
Of our Savior

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
The weight of the cross
The curse of our shame
You carried it all
And rose from the grave

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Thank You for the grace
That has saved us
You forgave us

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Thank You for the way
You have freed us

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
We have been ransomed
We've been rescued
We've been purchased

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
With the price of Your own life
Thank You for the way
That You love us
